properties.name: db-scheduler.heartbeat-interval
properties.description: 更新运行执行的检测信号时间戳的频率

properties.name: db-scheduler.polling-interval
properties.description: 调度程序检查数据库是否有到期执行的频率

properties.name: db-scheduler.polling-strategy-lower-limit-fraction-of-threads
properties.description: 轮询策略线程的下限分数

properties.name: db-scheduler.polling-strategy-upper-limit-fraction-of-threads
properties.description: 轮询策略线程的上限分数

properties.name: db-scheduler.table-name
properties.description: 用于跟踪任务执行的表的名称

properties.name: db-scheduler.immediate-execution-enabled
properties.description: 计划程序将尝试直接执行计划为now()

properties.name: shutdown-max-wait
properties.description: 在中断执行器服务线程之前，调度程序将等待多长时间
